section.title: resize
section.screen: for img in $(find ./album/ -type f -name *.jpg) do width=$(identify -format "%w" $img) height=$(identify -format "%h" $img) if [ $width -gt $height ]; then convert -resize 900x600 $img $img else convert -resize 600x900 $img $img fi done
